short_summary: Supply and delivery of UAS equipment, training, and support.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply and delivery of UAS Equipment, training and support. This procurement process is intended to result in the acquisition of UAS Equipment, training, and support with an option to acquire additional resources made available to National Defence for a period of up to sixteen (16) months after contract award.
full_summary:
# Uncrewed Air System (UAS) - Request for Proposal

### Procurement Details

*   **Solicitation Number:** W6399-23-LL63/001/SF
*   **Publication Date:** January 31, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** February 15, 2023, at 1:00 PM EST
*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence
*   **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Austin Sanford
	+ Email: Austin.Sanford@forces.gc.ca

### Background

The Department of National Defence is seeking a supplier to provide Uncrewed Air Systems (UAS) equipment, training, and support. This procurement process aims to acquire UAS equipment, training, and support for a period of up to 16 months after contract award, with an option to acquire additional resources.

### Requirements

The successful supplier must provide UAS equipment, training, and support that fully complies with the Technical Specifications outlined in the Request for Proposal solicitation document. Deliverables are required by March 31, 2023.

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Regions of Opportunity

The contract is open to both domestic and international suppliers.

### Important Notes

* Suppliers must qualify for Supply Arrangement W3048-21KJ89 to be eligible to bid on this requirement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Suppliers are responsible for ensuring their proposal meets the requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal solicitation document.

### Additional Information

Requests for clarification on the Request for Proposal document can be submitted through the contact information provided above. A copy of the Request for Supply Arrangement W3048-21KJ89 can be obtained by contacting Herb Choquette at Herb.Choquette@PWGSC.gc.ca.
